articles.description: Good morning, and welcome to the Essential California newsletter. It’s Tuesday, Feb. 6, and here’s what’s happening across California: TOP STORIES Legal battle As Marion “Suge” Knight’s murder trial approaches, prosecutors and Sheriff’s Department investigato…
